thread.title: Ellie Goulding and Dougie Poynter reunite for fashion event – as she accidentally flashes a bit too much
thread.title_full: Ellie Goulding and Dougie Poynter reunite for fashion event – as she accidentally flashes a bit too much

author: cgreenwood
title: Ellie Goulding and Dougie Poynter reunite for fashion event – as she accidentally flashes a bit too much
text:
The couple looked the picture of togetherness at the bash at Fabric in London Ellie Goulding shows her strength during intense fitness workout Related articles Rakesh Kotecha kidnapped after reuniting with wifePriya Sharma in Emmerdale STRUGGLE BEHIND BARS Emmerdale's Aaron Dingle suffers in prison as he's separated from husband Robert Sugden HEARTBREAKING TURN Emmerdale's Laurel kisses ex Marlon after husband Ashley forgets she has ever existed LIFE-SAVING MUSIC Benidorm star Tim Healy reveals he was in a coma for days after mystery illness and only his son's music brought him out of it dyer straits Danny Dyer 'could be off EastEnders until the SUMMER' after bosses forced him to take a break not astra-nomical Top Gear's final Reasonably Priced Car sells for £6,000 ... despite not being roadworthy SEA THROUGH Victoria's Secret Angel Elsa Hosk causes a splash while taking a dip in revealing black top during steamy shoot 'SHE SAID WHAT?!' Melody Thornton branded ‘weirder than Stephen Bear’ after X-rated confession on Celebs Go Dating IS IT A PLANE..? The Walking Dead fans spot flying 'plane' behind Rick Grimes during rare happy scene in zombie show 'I WANT TO ENJOY LIFE' Pop icon David Cassidy reveals he is battling dementia and plans to stop gigs to focus on his health MODELS GALORE Daisy Lowe and Lottie Moss join Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid at the LOVE and Burberry party SO NICE SHE SHARED IT TWICE Stephanie Davis claims to have had a fresh blow dry - but the video is from December 22 At one point the handsome McFly singer even lent in for a hug and kissed her on the cheek. A source told The Sun Online: “Ellie and Dougie were hanging out in the ceremony area after it had finished and most people had left. “Dougie was being very attentive and lent in to hug his ex and kiss her on the cheek before they headed towards the exit together. “They walked separately but were very friendly and amicable with each other.”
